Compute sigma parameter of Log-Normal from other quantities.

Source: R/utils_dists.R
get_lognormal_sigma_alternative.Rd

Compute sigma parameter of Log-Normal from other quantities.

Usage

get_lognormal_sigma_alternative(
  mu,
  unit_mean = NULL,
  unit_sd = NULL,
  unit_q5 = NULL,
  unit_q95 = NULL
)

Arguments

mu

Mu parameter of Log-Normal distribution.

unit_q5

5% quantile of distribution.

unit_q95

95% quantile of distribution.

Value

Sigma parameter of Log-Normal distribution.

Details

Currently, only conversion from mu + a quantile is supported, but other alternatives may be added.
